name: Quick Secret Eyes: The Furtive Spy Agent Training Academy - Free

description:
TRY OUR QUICK SECRET EYES : THE FURTIVE SPY AGENT TRAINING ACADEMY GAME

Did you ever dream to be spy agent? Then here we come with the most addictive spy agent training academy game.

In this game you need to be sharp and there are total 5 missions which include the practice and different assignments for you.

Mission 1: Find the face ID
Mission 2 : Reveal the Secret
Mission 3 : Find the Hidden Microphone
Mission 4 : Human Target
Mission 5 : Disarm the Bomb

Features:

- Game loaded with 5 different missions
- Awesome graphics and effects
- Multiplayer : send mission to your friends and challenge them to solve this missions

So what are you waiting for? get this amazing spy game on your finger!

DOWNLOAD TODAY FOR FREE >>> QUICK SECRET EYES : THE FURTIVE SPY AGENT TRAINING ACADEMY GAME
